ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work is dedicated to all those families who have suffered or are suffering more directly the Covid-19 pandemic all over the world, especially to all the persons who have passed away and their relatives. We thank Willi Tanner for his invaluable help during the coring campaign and Oliver Heiri for discussions on Holocene climate change. We are grateful to our colleagues at the Paleoecology section at the University of Bern for their support and fruitful discussions, as well as to two anonymous reviewers for their constructive suggestions. This research was funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation (Grant No.: SNF PP00P2-114886). The data will be publicly available in Neotoma Paleoecology Database ( www.neotomadb.org) upon publication.
